name: Romantic Stories Game
description:
Welcome to ROMANTIC STORIES, a game where your choices matter! One choice can change the course of the entire story.

CHOOSE WHISLY!
Change fate through your choices! Develop relationships with your favorite characters - will they be your friends, or rivals, and who you fall in love with!

CREATE YOUR LOOK
Customize your look, choose your outfit and hairstyle. Express yourself!

LIVE YOUR STORIES
Immerse yourself in romance, drama, love, or adventure! The options are endless!

Fascinating stories are waiting for you!
